title: Medal Of Honor Allied Assault + Breakthrough Expansion
description:
Medal Of Honor Allied Assault (2 cd) + 1.11 Update + Crack 

The Medal of Honor franchise continues on the PC, this time using the Quake III engine. You're Lt. Mike Powell, undertaking missions against Nazi Germany that involve infiltrating enemy camps, sabotaging factories and rescuing POWs. As in previous games in the series, historical fact comes into gameplay and you'll need to participate in real-world offensives like the invasion of Normandy. Make use of over 24 different weapons and take on soldiers and war machines alike.

Min System Requirements:
Windows XP/Me/2000/98/95 (Windows NT not supported) 
450 MHz Intel Pentium or 500 MHz AMD Athlon processor 
128 MB RAM 
8x CD/DVD-ROM drive 
1.2 GB free hard disk space 
16 MB DirectX 8.0 compatible video card with OpenGL support 
DirectX 8.0 compatible sound card

Recommended System Specs 
System: PIII 700 or equivalent 
Video Memory: 32 MB VRAM 
3D Sound Card: Yes

Medal Of Honor Allied Assault Breakthrough (1 cd) + Crack

Another Expension Pack for Medal of Honor Allied Assault. Breakthrough will let you assume the role of US Army Sergeant John Baker as the Allied forces battle from North Africa up the Italian peninsula. The 11-mission campaign starts you off at the battle of Kasserine Pass and then takes you into Messina in Sicily, Monte Cassino, and finally to the battle of Monte Battaglia.

Min System Requirements:


Minimum System Requirements 
System: 733MHz or equivalent 
RAM:128 MB RAM 
CD-ROM: 8X CD-ROM 
Video Memory: 16 MB VRAM 
Hard Drive Space: 800 MB 
DirectX: DirectX v8.0


Recommended System Requirements 
System: 1 GHz or equivalent 
Video Memory: 32 MB VRAM
